snippet: "We are pursuing this as a criminal act,” a federal agent said of the 2013 explosion, which also injured more than 260.
abstract: Federal officials announce fire that led to deadly explosion of fertilizer plant in West, Tex, in 2013 was intentionally set; explosion killed 15 people.
lead_paragraph: "We are pursuing this as a criminal act,” a federal agent said of the 2013 explosion, which also injured more than 260.

headline.main: Fire That Left 15 Dead at Texas Fertilizer Plant Is Ruled Intentional
headline.print_headline: 2013 Fire That Killed 15 at a Texas Plant Is Ruled Intentional

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
